channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: One year with Next.js App Router and why we're moving on
item.description:
Contents: A Technical Review, What are Server Components. The pitch of RSC is that components are put into two categories, "server" components and "client" components. This would be fine, except Client components can run on the backend too.

Read more

item.title: Carlo Rovelli’s radical perspective on reality
item.description:
Home Carlo Rovelli’s Radical Perspective on Reality Comment Save Article Read Later Share Facebook Copied. Comment Save Article Read Later There is no objective reality, according to Rovelli — only perspectives. We have two main theories that work incredibly well for different domains: general relativity and quantum mechanics.

Read more
